name: Kana Shimizu
content: Kana Shimizu Kana Shimizu Kana Shimizu's personal page HOME /CV /Links /Works About me I am a computational biologist having background of computer science. I am working as a professor at the department of computer science and engineering of the faculty of science and engineering in Waseda University. My research interests mainly center on algorithms for biological sequence analyses. My recent interest also includes privacy-preserving datamining for biological/biomedical data analysis. Keywords Computational biology, genomics, sequence analysis, next generation sequencing data, algorithms, data structure, machine learning, cryptographic protocol, privacy-preserving data mining Contact & Office Email: shimizu.kana (at) waseda.jp Mailing address: 3-4-1 Okubo Shinjuku-ku Tokyo, Japan, ZIP: 169-8555 Office location: room 01, 5-th floor, bldg. 63 Tel: +81-03-5286-3344 Lab URL: https://www.cbio.cs.waseda.ac.jp
